channel.title: I need your recommendation
channel.description: Ok there are a lot of RS Private server freaks out there who I know, know which server is best to start with. Preferably with txthandler.java. But if not that's fine just please, I need to know what a good starting source is. Thanks, later.

item.title: I need your recommendation
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Well Dodian is becoming more popular, and I have a tutorial on it right here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309996.0.html
All of which work for that source.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your recommendation
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

Well that’s what I’m trying to find.
I’m trying to find a good starter base compatible with most tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your recommendation
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Well if you want to create a whole new unique server, try starter bases as they have a lot to offer.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your recommendation
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

Thanks I’ll try out this one, but I used to have a server with Full Godsword building, almost every single skill, most doors and ladders worked, Unique godsword specials, clan system, tico’s server panel, tons of unique training areas, awesome shops, and talking NPC’s and someone hacked it… So it’s been about 6 months since I’ve made a server. "/

Read full topic

item.title: I need your recommendation
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Easily fixable?

Every server will get a bad compile if you don’t code right mate.
Trying to not be bias, but you could take a look at my server.

It’s a nice starter base, but it needs special attacks, more places - training areas, some skills etc.
But it can support mySQL (if you download it) and also it’s hard to dupe / crash it.

Here is the link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,308211.0.html
If not, you can try Richscape v3 - if you like PK sources.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your recommendation
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

No, I’m kinda picky I prefer something that is easy to work with, and if I make a mistake easily fixable. You know like a lower standard method, but easy to make a good server with.

Read full topic

item.title: I need your recommendation
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Depends on what you like, mySQL - more advanced methods…?

Read full topic
